content:
published  April  

BAGHDAD Iraq AP  Iran and Iraq exchanged hundreds of prisoners of war at their border Thursday the official Iraqi News Agency reported PERIOD The move was the first stage of a largescale swap of thousands of POWs captured in the two countries  war PERIOD
Iran freed  Iraqi prisoners and Iraq released  Iranian prisoners at the alMundhariya border crossing INA said PERIOD The crossing is  miles northeast of Baghdad PERIOD
Riyad alQaysi Iraqs deputy foreign minister was quoted by the agency as saying that more POWs would be freed shortly PERIOD
In Baghdad the governmentcontrolled newspaper alZawra said Iran would free  Iraqi prisoners of war PERIOD In Tehran Iranian television quoted a Foreign Ministry spokesman as saying  Iraqi prisoners would be exchanged for  Iranians PERIOD
If such numbers are released it would be the biggest prisoner exchange since  and would mark a major step in the improvement of relations between the two neighbors PERIOD
At least  million people were killed or wounded in the  war between Iraq and Iran PERIOD The fighting ended with a U.N PERIOD brokered ceasefire but animosity has persisted over the issue of prisoners PERIOD
Iraqi officials say Iran is still holding about  prisoners since the release of  soldiers in  PERIOD Since then smaller numbers of prisoners have been released frequently PERIOD
Prior to Thursdays release Iraq had said it held no Iranian POWs PERIOD Iran however says Baghdad is holding anywhere from  to  Iranian soldiers PERIOD
